name: D&D NPC Sheet
description: Develop your non-player character based on the Dungeons & Dragons tabletop role-playing game

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The NPC's Size determines how much space it occupies in combat (e.g. Tiny, Medium, Huge)

attributes.name: Race
attributes.description: The NPC's species, which influences their appearance and traits (e.g. Human, Dwarf, Elf)

attributes.name: Alignment
attributes.description: A representation of the NPC's ethical and moral values (e.g. lawful good, neutral, chaotic evil)

attributes.name: Armor Class
attributes.description: A score representing how difficult the NPC is to successfully attack

attributes.name: Hit Points
attributes.description: A score representing the NPC's current health

attributes.name: Speed
attributes.description: A score representing the NPC's raw speed, which is influenced by their Race

attributes.name: Strength
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing skill in physical combat, carrying objects, and breaking physical barriers

attributes.name: Dexterity
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing skill in dodging attacks, avoiding traps, and hiding from enemies

attributes.name: Constitution
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing health, endurance, and general survival ability

attributes.name: Intelligence
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing knowledge, cleverness, and logical reasoning skills

attributes.name: Wisdom
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing awareness, intuition, and ability to spot hidden traps and foes

attributes.name: Charisma
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing skill in social situations, likability, and general persuasiveness

attributes.name: Skills
attributes.description: The ability score of each character skill (e.g. acrobatics, arcana, medicine, religion, survival)

attributes.name: Senses
attributes.description: The NPC's Passive Wisdom (Perception) score, alongside any special senses they have

attributes.name: Languages
attributes.description: The languages the NPC speaks and understands

attributes.name: Challenge
attributes.description: A score representing how difficult the NPC is to defeat in combat and the experience points (XP) it awards

attributes.name: Saving Throws
attributes.description: A score representing the character's ability to resist or prevent a threat

attributes.name: Damage Resistances
attributes.description: The damage types that only cause the NPC half damage (e.g. bludgeoning, force, lightning)

attributes.name: Attacks & Spellcasting
attributes.description: A list of the NPC's favorite melee and ranged weapons (or spells) and describe their attacks

attributes.name: Cantrips
attributes.description: The lesser spells the NPC can cast at will

attributes.name: Actions
attributes.description: The actions the NPC can take in combat

attributes.name: Reactions
attributes.description: The NPC's special reactions in combat, if any

attributes.name: Equipment
attributes.description: The NPC's inventory of gear, gems, jewelry, magic items, and other objects of value (e.g. rope)
